description:
Put the butter on the stove over low heat. When it is close to melting, add the sugar. He continues to chew. Salt is added. Add the vanilla. Eggs are added. Slowly add the flour. Add the baking powder.
Divide the composition into the paper containers. Chocolate and walnut are added.
Place the tray in the oven at 180 degrees for 18 minutes.
ingredients:
For 12 cupcakes:
12 shapes,
165g flour (Dinkel Mehl 630),
150g of butter,
120g of sugar,
17g baking powder,
3 eggs,
Blueberries & Blackberries & Nuts & Chocolate Chips,
Vanilla extract - one ampoule,
A pinch of salt
name: Cupcakes

description: Boil the milk and add the sugar. He was chewing. After the sugar melts, add the butter. Milk powder is mixed with cocoa. On top of the milk boiled with sugar and butter, slowly add milk powder with cocoa, chew so that lumps do not form. Add walnuts and crushed biscuits.
ingredients:
400g milk powder,
100g of sugar,
310g normal milk,
200g of butter,
100g cocoa,
1 small ampoule of rum essence,
200g biscuits,
Raisins and walnuts to taste
name: Biscuits Sausage
